article: leander paes and gaurav unk defeated robert angelo and unk unk to give india an unbeatable #-# lead over the philippines in their asia-oceania group unk davis cup tie here saturday .
abstract: india beat philippines in davis cup
candidates: india take a lead over the philippines in their asia-oceania group unk davis cup tie.

the match was played at the unk davis stadium in chennai.
the match was a friendly between india and the philippines.
india won the match 3-1.
